TopicTitle: To the Mun and back the Fastest

Articles.Content:
Goal To get to the Mun and back the quickest.

Classes Two classes

  • Unlimited
  • Stock

Unlimited

this allows you to use what you want apart from hyper-editing the craft out there

Stock

Only stock parts allowed. Do not use the Debug tab!

Requirements

1. (Timer start) Start on the launchpad

2. The landers landing legs must touch the surface of Mun

3. The lander must return safely back to kerbin and it must touch the surface (land/sea)(timer end)

Scoring

The fastest time from the launch pad and back to kerbin wins

Screenshots are needed to prove you made the journey and completed the requirements

Challenge ends on release of 0.21 update

Good Luck

Rob

Leaderboard

Stock

1st-metaphor- 2hours 9 mins

Edited July 15, 2013 by Robbii6

There was a challenge like this about a month ago. Here's my 2 hours 9 min to Mun and back.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Well my first shot at this was a complete disaster but important scientific data was recorded. I'll have to make sure to try to hit the sunny side of the mun so I don't hit any hills like I did on this attempt. Lot more DV needed to get there faster as well.

Come on people we have only had one entry!!
There have been a few like this challenge. Does it matter if we use separate vehicles to get there and back? If not, I can do it very fast.
